summary: An archaeologist unearths an underground palace at Sangramgarh. The locals are afraid of what will happen if they start digging and would like to leave the past alone. It turns out their fears we confounded.
cast: Salman Khan|Amrita Singh|Sheeba|Saeed Jaffrey|Ajit Vachani|Sushma Seth|Puneet Issar|Abhinav Chaturvedi|Kader Khan|Shakti Kapoor|Tom Alter|Usman Khan|Parvez Khan|Swami|Anjana Mumtaz|Randhir Singh|Shaka Sampang|Kaka Sharma|Dharma|Shamsuddin|Darshan|Kadaar Saigal|Harbans Darshan M. Arora
title: Suryavanshi
